content:
I'm happy to help with carb-loading meal suggestions!

However, I have to clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or memories, so I don't know about your previous 5K charity run on February 20th. But I can definitely provide you with some general carb-loading meal suggestions!

For carb-loading, you'll want to focus on complex carbohydrates that are easy to digest and provide sustained energy. Here are some popular options:

1. Pasta with tomato sauce and vegetables (like your spaghetti choice!)
2. Brown rice with grilled chicken and steamed vegetables
3. Whole-grain bread with avocado and eggs
4. Oatmeal with banana and honey
5. Sweet potatoes with black beans and salsa
6. Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables and a citrus vinaigrette
7. Whole-grain pizza with plenty of vegetables and a moderate amount of cheese

Remember to stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water, and aim to carb-load 1-3 days before your event. Also, make sure to listen to your body and adjust your meal plan based on your individual needs and dietary preferences.

Good luck with your upcoming event, and I hope these suggestions help!
